title: Smoked haddock, mustard butter sauce and Iberico ham
description: Smoked haddock is accompanied by a buttery mustard sauce, wilted spinach and salty Iberico ham. Perfect to impress your friends at a dinner party.
ingredients: 200g/7oz floury potatoes (preferably Mayan Gold), peeled and sliced thickly
2 large fillets smoked haddock, pin-boned and cut into 125g/4½oz chunks
100ml/3½fl oz whole milk, or enough to cover the haddock fillets
1 garlic clove, peeled and left whole
